trans:
Then, is this a natural phenomenon? If this phenomenon
is natural, we wouldn't need to worry about the current situation at all. As time passes,
, .
if we consider it natural for humans to focus on medical school due to the increasing rate of non-childbirth
, ,
and the growing proportion of the elderly population,  then we don't even need to emphasize
that we must address this issue at all. However, the reason we constantly
pay attention to this phenomenon and the news continues to cover it is because this phenomenon is not natural.
In other words, the Tao is not being realized. Laozi's Tao Te Ching is a work of political thought. It is a political
. , . .
philosophy that teaches rulers how to govern. In other words, the people and politicians
. ,
who lead our society must recognize that the current situation in Korea is not natural
and work to transform what is unnatural into something natural. The high percentage of freshmen
at Seoul National University pursuing medical school is due to the fact that becoming a doctor
,
is seen as a lucrative profession with significant job authority. In other words, the way we are perceived
. ,
by others in our society has become the most important value. Since the evaluation of others defines our self-worth
as the top priority, these phenomena occur. If the measure of how to live your life
. ' '
is based on the evaluation of others, it is not natural at all.
